document_notes.text:
This update for dovecot23 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12673: improper implementation of NTLM does not check message buffer size (bsc#1174922).
- CVE-2020-12674: improper implementation of RPA mechanism (bsc#1174923).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In Dovecot before 2.3.11.3, sending a specially formatted NTLM request will crash the auth service because of an out-of-bounds read.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: In Dovecot before 2.3.11.3, sending a specially formatted RPA request will crash the auth service because a length of zero is mishandled.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
